title: Instructions for using the KIMITAP Smart

block.1: With KIMITAP Smart, you can share your information with friends and partners has become faster and easier than ever. With "one-touch technology" you can share all the information you want such as Phone number, Email, Line, Tiktok…
block.2: Activate and use the KIMITAP Smart quickly in 3 simple steps

block.1: Go to the KIMITAP Website via the link https://kimitap.com/register or scan the QR code below to register your account information
block.2: Fill in all the information on the KIMITAP account registration page according to specific instructions.
block.3: After filling in the information for the KIMITAP Smart, please log in to the system to activate and use the smart card or key.

block.1: Next, to add the KIMITAP smart with social networking information Line, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok ... You go to the Edit Link section, select "Create New Link". The system will let you choose the account type and add a link.
